Installation Setup


```{r setup}
#install.packages("formattable")
library(formattable)
```
Assignment Chunk

```{r}
#create vector variables 
names <- c("Jeb", "Donald", "Ted", "Marco", "Carly", "Hillary", "Berine")
abcVotes <- c(4, 62, 51, 21, 2, 14, 15)
cbsVotes <- c(12, 75, 43, 19, 1, 21, 19) 

#create data.frame
electionFrame <- data.frame(names, abcVotes, cbsVotes)

View(electionFrame)

#adjust visualization for quick insights
formattable(electionFrame, list(
  abcVotes = color_tile("transparent", "blue"),
  cbsVotes = color_tile("transparent", "red")
))
```
